dt-api.name: column().width()
dt-api.summary: Get the width of a column.

type.description: Compute the width of a column as it is shown.
type.returns: The width of the column in pixels.

dt-api.description:
This method is a helper method to get the width of the column in a table. It can be used by extension authors who need to utilise the width of a column (for example the _Buttons_ extension uses widths for the Excel and PDF export).
The result given is the "outer width" of the cells for the target column. If a column is hidden, is width will be returned as `0`.
The returned number might not be an integer, depending on the browser's table rendering.

example.title: Get the width for a column that was clicked on
